QuestData.Title: Gronnsbane: The Broken Spear
QuestData.Description:
Looking through Argoram's journal, it becomes apparent that claiming this relic will be far more complicated than simply finding the pieces of the spear.
However, that would be the best place to start...
QuestData.LogDescription: Search throughout Magnarok for Gronnsbane's blade, haft, and weight.
